attributes.action: Put the Army on the streets tonight to stop these criminal rioters
attributes.additional_details:
It is time that this mindless thuggery is ended. It is time for our government to deploy the Army on to our streets TONIGHT and protect us as citizens. After reports of a woman in Ealing, London having her home targeted by these rioters it is now beyond control.

If you no longer have faith that this matter can be handled by the police and no longer feel safe or protected by your local police force and government in your communities please sign this petition.
